name: Can You Beat It? [DEMO]
description:
This is a 5-minute demo of my first 3D game in Unity. The game is based on another game I used to play called "World's Hardest Game" or something like that.

This demo contains 5 levels that I've been working on. I'm also planning to add a speedrun mode for the full game (already in the works).

Game Instructions

You are the magenta cube. Your goal is to reach the level exit dying as less as possible.

Avoid touching blue and red bombs. The blue ones will kill you. The red ones will kill you and reset the whole level to its original state.

Some level exits are blocked by doors that can only be opened by pressing switches matching the door's colour.

Remember: this game is meant to be hard. Try to be as fast as possible. Every move counts.

Good luck!

Credits

Music: 

Space Philately (+ seamless loop) by Subdream (visit https://soundcloud.com/subdream)

Sound effects:

ChipTone (visit https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)

Thank you for playing!
